subject: health_science
title: Health and Wellness - Grade 9
content:
# Health and Wellness - Grade 9

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand health concepts related to Holistic Health, Wellness Dimensions, Lifestyle Choices
- Apply health knowledge to daily life
- Make informed decisions about personal and community health

## Introduction
This lesson covers Health and Wellness, focusing on Holistic Health, Wellness Dimensions, Lifestyle Choices. Students will learn practical health information
relevant to Sri Lankan context and their daily lives.

## Main Content
This section covers Holistic Health, Wellness Dimensions, Lifestyle Choices. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Health Guidelines
Evidence-based health recommendations

## Practical Applications
1. Personal health practices
2. Community health initiatives
3. Prevention strategies
4. Health promotion activities

## Case Studies
Real-life scenarios from Sri Lankan communities demonstrating health concepts.

## Activities
- Health assessments
- Group projects
- Community surveys
- Health promotion campaigns

## Assessment
Projects, presentations, practical demonstrations, and written tests.

## Resources
- Health Science textbook for Grade 9
- WHO and Ministry of Health guidelines
- Local health statistics
- Guest speakers from health sector
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to Health and Wellness
